item.title: How to create an improved Microsoft Teams Files approval process using Azure Logic Apps
item.description: We are all there during some days: Power Automate Premium is the key to the next level but there is no way we could justify that licensing – the ROI is simply not enough.

item.title: How to transition from Power Automate to Logic Apps
item.description: Introduction Hello, are you looking to understand the differences between Power Automate and Azure Logic Apps – or not sure what each of these does and when to use them?
